name: Contact Info
author: aviplugins.com

sections.description:
This plugin automatically allows you to write shortcodes to wordpress text widgets.

For Phone No : <?php echo ci(“ci_phone_1”); ?> Or Shortcode [ci show=”ci_phone_1″]
For Email Address : <?php echo ci(“ci_email_1”);?> Or Shortcode [ci show=”ci_email_1″]
For Address/Any Text : <?php echo ci(“ci_address_1”);?> Or Shortcode [ci show=”ci_address_1″]

how to use information is also available is plugin admin section.
sections.installation:
1. Upload contact-info to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Change some opional settings in plugin settings section.
  4. Add contact widget from widget section.
sections.faq:
For any kind of issues

  1. Please email at demoforafo@gmail.com
  2. Or you can create support ticket at https://www.aviplugins.com/support.php

short_description: This plugin will allow you to add contact information from admin panel and show them in frontend. Using shortcodes and functions.
